import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import {VIDEO_TRANSCODE_PREVIEW} from '../../../../url'; import './payment_preview_page.css' class Preview extends Component { state={ transcode_id:'', video_details:[] } componentDidMount() { this.setState({transcode_id:this.props.match.params.transcoding_id}) console.log(this.props.match.params.transcoding_id); axios.post(VIDEO_TRANSCODE_PREVIEW,{ id:this.props.match.params.transcoding_id }) .then(response=>{ var result=response.data; if(result.success=="1") { this.setState({video_details:result.data}); } }) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error); }); } render() { const {video_details}=this.state; const link=this.props.location.pathname.split('/'); const tag=link[4]; if(video_details!=null) { return(

{video_details.transcode_id}

{video_details.email}

{video_details.preset}

{video_details.container}

{video_details.video_length}

{video_details.aspect_ratio}

{video_details.priority=='0' && Low} {video_details.priority=='1' && Medium} {video_details.priority=='2' && High}

{video_details.AccountId}

{video_details.created_at}

{video_details.status=='0' && Queued} {video_details.status=='1' && In Progress} {video_details.status=='2' && Preview Available}

Rs. {video_details.price}

); } else { return (
Loading...
); } } } export default Preview;
